alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Pennington; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:21PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Marshall, northeastern Red Lake and Pennington Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 221 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Hilaire to near Oklee. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thief River Falls, Plummer, St. Hilaire, Goodridge, Mavie, Hazel and High Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
